title: The treaty limiting U.S. and Russian nuclear arms is expiring. What to know.
summary_full: U.S. lawmakers have expressed concern that the end of New START could lead to “a dangerous and costly arms race” between the world’s biggest nuclear powers.
summary_public: U.S. lawmakers have expressed concern that the end of New START could lead to “a dangerous and costly arms race” between the world’s biggest nuclear powers.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: The treaty limiting U.S. and Russian nuclear arms is expiring.
